attributes.action: Ban sky lanterns.  They injure and kill animals,   and they cause fires.
attributes.additional_details:
Rspb - https://www.rspca.org.uk/adviceandwelfare/litter/chineselanterns
Chief fire officers association
http://www.cfoa.org.uk/12050
Countryside online
https://www.countrysideonline.co.uk/care-for-the-countryside/sky-lanterns/
attributes.background: Ban the sale and release of sky lanterns. They're a fire risk and have killed and injured wildlife and farm animals.  Current regulations aren't doing enough to stop this.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310556
